verses.verse: Therefore,<WG3606> holy<WG40> brothers,<WG80> partakers<WG3353> of a heavenly<WG2032> calling,<WG2821> consider<WG2657> the Apostle<WG652> and<WG2532> High Priest<WG749> of<WG3671> our<WG2257> confession,<WG3671> Jesus;<WG2424>
who was<WG5607> faithful<WG4103> to him who appointed<WG4160> him,<WG846> as<WG5613> also<WG2532> was Moses<WG3475> in<WG1722> all<WG3650> his<WG846> house.<WG3624>

For<WG1063> he<WG3778> has been counted worthy<WG515> of<WG1391> more<WG4119> glory<WG1391> than<WG3844> Moses,<WG3475> inasmuch<WG2596> as<WG3745> he who built<WG2680> the house<WG846> has<WG2192> more<WG4119> honor<WG5092> than the house.<WG3624>
For<WG1063> every<WG3956> house<WG3624> is built<WG2680> by<WG5259> someone;<WG5100> but<WG1161> he who built<WG2680> all things<WG3956> is God.<WG2316>

<WG2532> Moses<WG3475> indeed<WG3303> was faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> all<WG3650> his<WG846> house<WG3624> as<WG5613> a servant,<WG2324> for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> of those things which were afterward to be spoken,<WG2980>

but<WG1161> Christ<WG5547> is faithful as<WG5613> a Son<WG5207> over<WG1909> his<WG846> house;<WG3624> whose<WG3739> house<WG3624> we<WG2070> are,<WG1437> if we<WG2249> hold fast<WG2722> our confidence<WG3954> and<WG2532> the glorying<WG2745> of our hope<WG1680> firm<WG949> to<WG3360> the end.<WG5056>
Therefore,<WG1352> even as<WG2531> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> says,<WG3004> "Today<WG4594> if<WG1437> you will hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice,<WG5456>
don't<WG3361> harden<WG4645> your<WG5216> hearts,<WG2588> as<WG5613> in<WG1722> the rebellion,<WG3894> like as in<WG2596> the day<WG2250> of the trial<WG3986> in<WG1722> the wilderness,<WG2048>
where<WG3757> your<WG5216> fathers<WG3962> tested<WG3985> me<WG3165> by proving<WG1381> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> saw<WG1492> my<WG3450> works<WG2041> for forty<WG5062> years.<WG2094>

Therefore<WG1352> I was displeased<WG4360> with that<WG1565> generation,<WG1074> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> <WG4105> 'They always<WG104> err<WG4105> in<WG2588> their heart,<WG2588> but<WG1161> they<WG846><WG99999> didn't<WG3756> know<WG1097> my<WG3450> ways;<WG3598>'
as<WG5613> I swore<WG3660> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> wrath,<WG3709> <WG1525> 'They will not<WG1487> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> rest.<WG2663>'"

Beware,<WG991> brothers,<WG80> lest<WG3379> perhaps there be<WG2071> in<WG1722> any<WG5100> one of you<WG5216> an<WG2588> evil<WG4190> heart<WG2588> of unbelief,<WG570> in<WG1722> falling away<WG868> from<WG575> the living<WG2198> God;<WG2316>

but<WG235> exhort<WG3870> one another<WG1438> <WG1538> day<WG2596> by day,<WG2250> so<WG891> long<WG3739> as it is called<WG2564> "today;<WG4594>" lest<WG3363> any<WG5100> one of<WG1537> you<WG5216> be hardened<WG4645> by the deceitfulness<WG539> of sin.<WG266>
For<WG1063> we have become<WG1096> partakers<WG3353> of Christ,<WG5547> if<WG1437> we hold<WG2722> fast the beginning<WG746> of our confidence<WG5287> firm<WG949> to<WG3360> the end:<WG5056>

while<WG1722> it is said,<WG3004> "Today<WG4594> if<WG1437> you will hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice,<WG5456> don't<WG3361> harden<WG4645> your<WG5216> hearts,<WG2588> as<WG5613> in<WG1722> the rebellion.<WG3894>"
For<WG1063> who,<WG1063> when they heard,<WG191> rebelled?<WG3893> No,<WG235> didn't<WG3756> all<WG3956> those who came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> Egypt<WG125> by<WG1223> Moses?<WG3475>

<WG1161> With whom<WG5101> was he displeased<WG4360> forty<WG5062> years?<WG2094> Wasn't<WG3780> it with those who sinned,<WG264> whose<WG3739> bodies<WG2966> fell<WG4098> in<WG1722> the wilderness?<WG2048>
<WG1161> To whom<WG5101> did he<WG3660> swear that<WG3361> they<WG1525> wouldn't<WG3361> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> his<WG846> rest,<WG2663> but<WG1487> <WG3361> to those who were disobedient?<WG544>
<WG2532> We see<WG991> that<WG3754> they were<WG1410> not<WG3756> able to enter in<WG1525> because of<WG1223> unbelief.<WG570>
